data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Pando, Bolivia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pando, Bolivia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 19,938 believers in the state of Pando to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Pando, Bolivia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Pando, Bolivia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Spanish-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Pando, Bolivia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,938 believers in Pando to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 83,162 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pando, Bolivia has a population of 103,100.

We estimate Pando has 19,938 people who might know Jesus, 75,371 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,791 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Pando, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.
